price: তাত থাকিব সিহঁতৰ চিঞৰ-বাখৰ আৰু আৰ্তনাদ, সেই কাৰণে সিহঁতে তাত একোৱে শুনা নাপাব;
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
